name: @tomtom-org/maps-sdk-examples
description: JavaScript library for examples of TomTom maps and location services

scripts.test:e2e: pnpm exec playwright install --with-deps chromium && playwright test
scripts.test:e2e:ui: pnpm exec playwright install --with-deps chromium && playwright test --ui
scripts.test:e2e:update-all-snapshots: pnpm exec playwright install --with-deps chromium && playwright test --update-snapshots
scripts.test:e2e:update-snapshot: bash -c 'pnpm exec playwright install --with-deps chromium && playwright test "$1"/ --update-snapshots' _
